item.title: EMA Says Active Substance in Tardive Dyskinesia Drug Not New
item.description: New draft guidelines on the definition of new active substances don’t apply to deutetrabenazine, the European drug regulator has decided. Medscape Med...

item.title: Which Food Labeling System Promotes Healthier Purchases?
item.description: A spectrum labeling system rating foods from least to most healthy can promote healthier food purchases than other front-of-pack labeling systems. Med...

item.title: Europe Adopts New Subcutaneous Route for Systemic Lupus Drug
item.description: Saphnelo can now be administered subcutaneously rather than intravenously following the European regulator’s recommendation. Medscape Medical News

item.title: Optimal Anesthesia Choice in EVT: A Wake-Up Call?
item.description: General anesthesia leads to better functional outcomes than conscious sedation in stroke patients with large vessel occlusion undergoing endovascular ...

item.title: EMA OKs First Therapy for Non-Cystic Fibrosis Bronchiectasis
item.description: Estimates suggest between 400,000 and three million people in Europe have NCFB. Medscape Medical News
